maml:description.maml:para: Exports the Visual C++ Redistributables XML to an external file.
Reads the Visual C++ Redistributables XML manifests included in the VcRedist module and exports the XML to an external file. This enables editing of the XML manifest for custom scenarios.

maml:Description.maml:para: Path to the XML file the content will be exported to.
Switch parameter that defines the list of Visual C++ Redistributables to export - All Redistributables or Supported Redistributables only. Defaults to exporting the Supported Redistributables.
Path to the XML file the content will be exported to.
Switch parameter that defines the list of Visual C++ Redistributables to export - All Redistributables or Supported Redistributables only. Defaults to exporting the Supported Redistributables.

maml:alert.maml:para: Name: Export-VcXml Author: Aaron Parker Twitter: @stealthpuppy

dev:remarks.maml:para: Description: Export the list of supported Visual C++ Redistributables to C:\Temp\VisualCRedistributablesSupported.xml.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates and array of Visual C++ Redistributables listed in an external XML file.
This function reads the Visual C++ Redistributables listed in an external XML file into an array that can be passed to other VcRedist functions.
A complete XML file listing the redistributables is included. The basic structure of the XML file should be:

<Redistributables> <Platform Architecture="x64" Release="" Install=""> <Redistributable> <Name></Name> <ShortName></ShortName> <URL></URL> <ProductCode></ProductCode> <Download></Download> </Platform> <Platform Architecture="x86" Release="" Install=""> <Redistributable> <Name></Name> <ShortName></ShortName> <URL></URL> <ProductCode></ProductCode> <Download></Download> </Redistributable> </Platform> </Redistributables>

maml:Description.maml:para: The XML file that contains the details about the Visual C++ Redistributables. This must be in the expected format.
Defines the list of Visual C++ Redistributables to export - All Redistributables or Supported Redistributables only. Defaults to exporting the Supported Redistributables.
The XML file that contains the details about the Visual C++ Redistributables. This must be in the expected format.
Defines the list of Visual C++ Redistributables to export - All Redistributables or Supported Redistributables only. Defaults to exporting the Supported Redistributables.

maml:alert.maml:para: Name: Get-VcXml Author: Aaron Parker Twitter: @stealthpuppy

dev:remarks.maml:para: Description: Return an array of the Visual C++ Redistributables from the embedded manifest
Description: Return an array of the Visual C++ Redistributables listed in VisualCRedistributablesSupported.xml.

maml:description.maml:para: Downloads the Visual C++ Redistributables from an array returned by Get-VcXml.

Downloads the Visual C++ Redistributables from an array returned by Get-VcXml into a folder structure that represents release and processor architecture. If the redistributable exists in the specified path, it will not be re-downloaded.

maml:Description.maml:para: Sepcifies the array that lists the Visual C++ Redistributables to download
Specify a target folder to download the Redistributables to, otherwise use the current folder.
Specifies the release (or version) of the redistributables to download or install.
Specifies the processor architecture to download or install.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
Sepcifies the array that lists the Visual C++ Redistributables to download
Specify a target folder to download the Redistributables to, otherwise use the current folder.
Specifies the release (or version) of the redistributables to download or install.
Specifies the processor architecture to download or install.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

maml:alert.maml:para: Name: Get-VcRedist Author: Aaron Parker Twitter: @stealthpuppy

dev:remarks.maml:para: Description: Downloads the Visual C++ Redistributables listed in VisualCRedistributables.xml to C:\Redist.
Description: Downloads the Visual C++ Redistributables listed in $VcRedists to C:\Redist.
Description: Downloads only the 2012, 2013 & 2017 releases of the Visual C++ Redistributables listed in $VcRedists
Description: Downloads only the 64-bit versions of the Visual C++ Redistributables listed in $VcRedists.
Description: Downloads only the 64-bit versions of the Visual C++ Redistributables listed in $VcRedists.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates Visual C++ Redistributable applications in a ConfigMgr site.

Creates an application in a Configuration Manager site for each Visual C++ Redistributable and includes setting whether the Redistributable can run on 32-bit or 64-bit Windows and the Uninstall key for detecting whether the Redistributable is installed.
Use Get-VcList and Get-VcRedist to download the Redistributable and create the array of Redistributables for importing into ConfigMgr.

maml:Description.maml:para: An array containing details of the Visual C++ Redistributables from Get-VcList.
A folder containing the downloaded Visual C++ Redistributables.
Specifies the release (or version) of the redistributables to download or install.
Specifies the processor architecture to download or install.
Specify the Site Code for ConfigMgr app creation.
Specify a UNC path where the Visual C++ Redistributables will be distributed from
{{Fill Publisher Description}}
{{Fill Language Description}}
{{Fill CMAppFolder Description}}
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

A folder containing the downloaded Visual C++ Redistributables.

maml:alert.maml:para: Name: Import-VcCmApp Author: Aaron Parker Twitter: @stealthpuppy

maml:description.maml:para: Creates Visual C++ Redistributable applications in a Microsoft Deployment Toolkit share.

Creates an application in a Microsoft Deployment Toolkit share for each Visual C++ Redistributable and includes setting whether the Redistributable can run on 32-bit or 64-bit Windows and the Uninstall key for detecting whether the Redistributable is installed.
Use Get-VcList and Get-VcRedist to download the Redistributable and create the array of Redistributables for importing into MDT.

maml:Description.maml:para: An array containing details of the Visual C++ Redistributables from Get-VcList.
A folder containing the downloaded Visual C++ Redistributables.
Specifies the release (or version) of the redistributables to download or install.
Specifies the processor architecture to download or install.
The path to the MDT deployment share.
{{Fill MdtDrive Description}}
{{Fill Publisher Description}}
{{Fill Language Description}}

Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

maml:alert.maml:para: Name: Import-VcMdtApp Author: Aaron Parker Twitter: @stealthpuppy

dev:remarks.maml:para: Description: Retrieves the list of Visual C++ Redistributables, downloaded them C:\Temp\VcRedist and imports each Redistributable into the MDT dpeloyment share at \\server\deployment.
Parameter sets here means that Install, MDT and ConfigMgr actions are mutually exclusive

maml:description.maml:para: Installs the Visual C++ Redistributables from a list created by Get-VcList and downloaded locally with Get-VcRedist.

maml:alert.maml:para: Name: Install-VcRedist Author: Aaron Parker Twitter: @stealthpuppy

dev:remarks.maml:para: Description: Installs the Visual C++ Redistributables listed in $VcRedists and downloaded to C:\Temp\VcRedists.
Description: Installs only the 64-bit 2012, 2013 and 2017 Visual C++ Redistributables listed in $VcRedists and downloaded to C:\Temp\VcRedists.
